name: PhishingAttackUpdated
author: Jes√∫s Angosto
summary: Investigation and mitigation of phishing incidents.

tasks.title: Verify sender address
tasks.description: Confirm that the sender address belongs to the phishing campaign.

tasks.title: Analyze the email
tasks.description: Examine headers, body, and attachments to extract IoCs.

tasks.title: Block the sender
tasks.description: Block the sender address to prevent additional messages.

tasks.title: Notify affected users
tasks.description: Notify impacted users and provide a phishing awareness guide.

tasks.title: Update awareness guidelines
tasks.description: Refresh or schedule phishing-awareness training activities.

tasks.title: Detection source
tasks.description: Document how the attack was detected (e.g., SIEM alert, user report, email analysis tool).

tasks.title: Analyze malicious links
tasks.description: Validate whether the links in the email lead to malicious or spoofed sites.

tasks.title: Analyze attachments
tasks.description: Inspect attachments for malware or malicious scripts.

tasks.title: Review filtering rules
tasks.description: Verify and update email filtering rules to prevent similar attacks.

tasks.title: Review compromised access
tasks.description: Check whether any user was compromised and take action (password resets, log reviews).

tasks.title: Incident report
tasks.description: Document the full investigation, actions taken, and recommendations.

tasks.title: Collected evidence
tasks.description: List the files, screenshots, logs, and other artifacts used in the investigation.

note_directories.title: Phishing email body
note_directories.content: Summary of the email body content.

note_directories.title: Detection source
note_directories.content: Details on how the incident was detected (e.g., automatic alert, manual report, etc.).

note_directories.title: Collected evidence
note_directories.content: List of files, screenshots, logs, and other items gathered during the investigation.
